name: zoom-lens
effect: Held: Raises the holder’s Accuracy by 20% when it goes last. Ingame description is incorrect.
short_effect: Held: Provides a 1/5 (20%) boost in accuracy if the holder moves after the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after its target moves, its accuracy will be boosted.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after its target moves, its accuracy will be boosted.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after its target moves, its accuracy will be boosted.
